settings.custom_liquid:
{%- unless template == 'index' or template == 'cart' or template == 'list-collections' or template == '404' -%} {%- assign t = template | split: '.' | first -%}
  1. Home
    2. {%- case t -%} {%- when 'page' -%}
  2. {{ page.title }}
    3. {%- when 'product' -%} {%- if collection.url -%}
  3. {{ collection.title | link_to: collection.url }}
    4. {%- endif -%}
  4. {{ product.title }}
    5. {%- when 'collection' and collection.handle -%} {%- if current_tags -%}
  5. {{ collection.title | link_to: collection.url }}
  6. {%- capture tag_url -%}{{ collection.url }}/{{ current_tags | join: "+"}}{%- endcapture -%} {{ current_tags | join: " + "}}
    7. {%- else -%}
  7. {{ collection.title }}
    8. {%- endif -%} {%- when 'blog' -%} {%- if current_tags -%}
  8. {{ blog.title | link_to: blog.url }}
  9. {%- capture tag_url -%}{{blog.url}}/tagged/{{ current_tags | join: "+" }}{%- endcapture -%} {{ current_tags | join: " + " }}
    10. {%- else -%}
  10. {{ blog.title }}
    11. {%- endif -%} {%- when 'article' -%}
  11. {{ blog.title | link_to: blog.url }}
  12. {{ article.title }}
    13. {%- else -%}
  13. {{ page_title }}
    14. {%- endcase -%}
{%- endunless -%}

{%- assign current_variant = product.selected_or_first_available_variant -%} ID: {{ current_variant.sku }} {% if current_variant.barcode %}{%- assign current_variant = product.selected_or_first_available_variant -%} / Code: {{ current_variant.barcode }}

{% endif %}

settings.heading: True Condition
settings.content:
Our condition ratings are over 99,5% accurate! Our highly skilled technitians use authentic film-era machinery to evaluate an item's true condtion.

See more at the bottom of the page.

settings.heading: 14 Day Returns
settings.content:
Change your mind? Not satisfied? Let us know within 14 days of delivery for a return and refund.

settings.heading: Actual Item Pictured
settings.content: We take the time to photograph every used item.Â When you buy from us you are getting the item you see in the photos.Â

settings.title: Lens Optics
settings.text: Small amount of dust and scratches typically have have little or no impact on images, but major defects degrade sharpness and contrast.Â These defects can be haze, fungus, element separation, dust, or scratches. We inspect all lenses & then clean, repair when equitable, or state the acceptable issues in the product condition & description, should it pass our quality control.

settings.title: Lens Mechanics
settings.text: In addition to acceptable optics, a lens's mechanical performace is also significant. Focal ring movement, zoom movement, aperture blade condition, mount and filter thread are just a few of things we check and evaluate.

settings.title: Infinity Focusing & Rangefinder Alignment
settings.text: Using a "Collimator" to simulate focusing at infinity, we are able to check a lenses focus from near to far. We also use a special high-contrast target board to check that a rangefinder lens is in alignment with its viewfinders rangefinder.

settings.title: Calibration & Repair
settings.text: We the have authentic modern & film-era machinery required to accurately test shutter speed performance. They tell us how long the shutter is open and wether the shutter curtains are moving correctly or not. Different camera types require different machines.
Do you have unused camera gear laying around? We buy cameras, lenses, and accessories of all ages. Sell for cash or trade-in for something new.
